title: The 50 most important interpretations of seeing a beard in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a beard in a dream: A beard is that hair that grows in the chin area in men and sometimes adds an attractive touch or gives a religious character to its owner, so its interpretation is. A beard in a dream may bring good news. It indicates danger and may indicate a message from a family member. A beard in A dream: Many commentators explain a beard in a dream. It indicates status, money, and prestige, and it also carries many connotations of goodness and livelihood. Ibn Sirin points out that a beard in a dream means social status, depending on the size, density, and length of the beard, the man’s position in society or in the field of work. For example, whoever sees this has reached His beard extends to his chest, and he will obtain a lot of sustenance after toiling and toiling. As for one whose beard is as long as his foot, this means a prolongation of his life, God willing. A beard that reaches the navel shows the dreamer’s many sins and he must hasten to repent, so the vision is a warning message to him. If he sees that the beard does not It grows except on the sides, as this indicates pain and anxiety, or that the stranger will take a lot of money from him either through theft or debt. The beard in the dream also indicates other indicators according to its color, as the yellow color of the beard means the illness of the dreamer or of someone he loves. As for the beard Green color indicates advancement in positions, whether in the academic field or at work. Whoever sees that the hair of his beard falls out, but it falls on his hand, this means recovery of the money he lost, but if the hair falls to the ground, this means the loss of the money he earned. The man who sees That the hair of his beard has begun to stick to his chin expresses a feature of his personality, which is his independence from himself to achieve his dreams and that he can achieve what he wants. Seeing a young child showing his beard or hair on his chin indicates that child’s illness and the possibility of his death soon. As for whoever sees that half of his face is If only he has hair, then he loses all of his wealth, or loses his job. A man who sees his beard being sold in the markets means that he is committing sins, sins, and false statements. Whoever sees in a dream that his beard is shorter than it is in reality, this indicates his low status in the eyes of those who About him. Al-Nabulsi says in his explanation of a beard in a dream that a long beard indicates bad morals. A beard that is irregular and contains dirt and dust that blurs its color means that its owner has a bad quality that people know about and he must try to get rid of it. A man who sees someone pulling his beard violently means that he will humiliate him and take revenge. From him or distorts his reputation among people. As for the one who wraps his beard around his finger, this indicates his extreme arrogance and arrogance. A white beard in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. A white beard usually indicates status, dignity, and wisdom among men, and if a person sees in a dream that his beard has turned white and has not Some of its black color remains, as this means its high status among the people and the respect and appreciation of the tour. For him. But if he has a little gray hair, then this indicates wealth and money, and according to the percentage of whiteness in the beard, he is rich. Also, a white beard has connotations that vary depending on the dreamer’s job. For example, a merchant means that he

title: Interpretation of a dream about a gift from the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream: A gift from the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a dream. There are many meanings that express seeing the Messenger. Interpretation of a dream: A gift from the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a dream. Interpretation of a dream: A gift from the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a dream that expresses kindness, God willing. If the dreamer sees the Prophet When a married man sees the Prophet giving him a gift in a dream, this may be evidence of praiseworthy things, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if a married woman sees the Prophet giving her a gift, this may indicate the good that she will receive. And God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Messenger from afar in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Messenger from afar in a dream. We did not find clear explanations for seeing the Messenger from afar, except that seeing the Messenger in a dream could be a sign of goodness, and God knows best. When you see the Messenger, he said, this indicates joy and happiness. God willing, if the dreamer sees the Prophet frowning, this may indicate anxiety, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Messenger’s daughters in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Prophet’s daughters in a dream could lead to marriage to a righteous woman, and God knows best. And if the dreamer sees the Messenger’s daughters, it may indicate a righteous woman, and God knows best. If the woman sees Married Fatima Al-Zahra in a dream. This may be evidence of a person’s loss, and God knows the unseen. Some also mentioned that it could express goodness and happiness, God willing. Interpretation of a dream of hearing the voice of the Prophet Muhammad in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of hearing the voice of the Prophet Muhammad in a dream could be an indication of good news, by God. I know the unseen. It can express receiving happy news, and God knows best. If the dreamer hears the voice of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, perhaps it is a sign of his repentance for sins, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It can also indicate goodness and happiness, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about hearing the sound of the Qur’an in the bathroom in a dream. Interpretation of a dream. Hearing the sound of the Qur’an in the bathroom in a dream can indicate hypocrites, and God knows the unseen. And because it may express the betrayal of some hypocrites, God is also higher and more knowledgeable. When a single girl sees hearing the sound of the Qur’an in the bathroom, it can indicate problems and difficulties, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees She herself hears the sound of the Qur’an in a dream, as this may be evidence of disagreements, and God is Most High and All-Knowing.Interpretation of a dream of not being able to hear the Qur’an in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of not being able to hear the Qur’an in a dream. Not being able to read the Qur’an may indicate that you are listening to songs, and God knows the unseen. Seeing the inability to read the Qur’an can also express difficult problems, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees her inability to read the Qur’an, this may lead to her turning away from God and she must return. God is Most High and Most Knowing.Interpretation of a dream about difficulty memorizing the Qur’an in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about difficulty memorizing the Qur’an in a dream Difficulty reading the Qur’an can be interpreted as turning away from God and must return, and God knows the unseen.If a married woman finds it difficult to

title: What is the interpretation of the dream of an unmarried woman having a child according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about being single and giving birth to a child is among the visions that cause a feeling of astonishment mixed with confusion in the dreamer, and then many questions haunt him, including: Is this vision one of the good and promising visions of what is almost good, or does it have another meaning? Does the interpretation differ depending on the child’s condition or not?! We answer this in detail in the following lines, so continue. Interpretation of the dream of an unmarried woman giving birth to a child by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of the dream of being single and giving birth to a child? For an unmarried woman to see that she has a child is one of the visions in which there is a lot of goodness and happiness that awaits the fortuneteller as a result of her connection Someone who loves her, loves her, and treats her kindly. But if an unmarried woman sees that she has given birth to a child and is crying intensely in a dream, this is one of the dreams that warns her of the emergence of many obstacles that hinder her progress, and that make her live in a state of sadness and grief. Ordeal. An unmarried woman’s dream means that she has a child, but it is not visible. It is an indication of her haste in making many decisions that will lead to crises and problems in the short term and she will suffer a lot. For this reason, she must be careful, take her time, and take the advice of her parents in all her fateful decisions. If an unmarried woman is going through a health crisis or financial difficulties and sees in a dream that she has a small child, this is a sign of the descent of sadness and the end of a difficult stage in which she was subjected to persecution and repression. Extreme suffering. Interpretation of the dream of an unmarried woman giving birth to a child by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing an unmarried girl having a well-formed child is one of the praiseworthy visions that portends goodness and happiness and the girl will be able to achieve her desired goals. Watching an unmarried woman giving birth to a child indicates that the woman is in The vision is living a strong love story with a pious man who will take care of her and marry her in the coming period. However, if an unmarried woman sees that she has a child and signs of fatigue and exhaustion appear on her, this is evidence that the viewer is exposed to a health crisis or an illness that will afflict her for some time. Whereas, if an unmarried woman sees that She has a hungry child and she feeds him and she is very happy, this is a sign that her life conditions are improving and she may move to another place, she can get a new job. From which he gets a lot of money. The dream interpretation section on the Egyptian website contains many interpretations and questions from followers. You can find it by searching on Google for the Egyptian dream interpretation site. Important interpretations of a dream of a single woman having a childInterpretation of a dream of an unmarried woman having a walking childAccording to what was reported by leading dream interpreters, an unmarried woman’s vision that she has a child walking, laughing, and playing is an indication that the dreamer He is going through a period in which you will see many positive changes. Not only on the family or academic level, but this is followed by positive changes in her personality and this appears in her patience and thinking before making her decisions. It is also suggested that the visionary bears many responsibilities that she cannot bear alone and needs backing and support to extend a helping hand until she succeeds.

title: Interpretation of a dream about henna for single and married women

preview.html: The meaning of henna for a man, for a pregnant woman on his hand or on his legs, for an unmarried woman. Applying henna on Ibn Sirin’s hair. Seeing the ocean in a dream is one of the dreams that has many signs and clues in our lives, so when we see a vision in a dream, we search on different sites for its correct and accurate interpretation. Today, through this website, we present to you a distinguished group of dream scholars and interpreters. The vision varies from one person to another and from one woman to another, as well as the time and place, so the person with the vision must tell his vision as he sees it in a dream in order to obtain the correct and accurate interpretation. Interpretation of the henna symbol in DreamHenna, if seen in a dream, indicates joy, pleasure, and peace of mind. If the dreamer is a single girl and sees henna patterns on her legs, this is evidence of a journey with marriage. If a married woman sees that she is drawing henna on her hand, this is evidence of pregnancy. If a married woman sees that her mother is the one giving If she has henna or paints her hand, this indicates that she will give birth. If the dreamer sees henna in a dream, the subject symbolizes change for the better, so be optimistic about this matter and know that something good will soon rule your life, whether it is on the level of work, emotion, family, or Social life. Henna in a dream for an unmarried girl symbolizes marriage and good luck in life. On the other hand, it is possible that henna in a dream symbolizes an imminent recovery in the event of the dreamer’s illness or the presence of a patient whom the dreamer cares about. Henna in a dream is a sign of comfort and an end to problems and disagreements, It is a change for the better and a fix for all matters. Henna in a dream symbolizes change for the better, so be optimistic about the new change that occurs in your life, whether in work, love, family, or social life. Henna on the hand can symbolize marriage and good luck in an unmarried girl’s dream. Henna on the hand symbolizes treating a relative if you are sick or a patient you care about. If you are married and see your mother giving you henna, this symbolizes that you will have children. Interpretation of henna in one dream. If an unmarried girl sees henna on her hands in a dream, this is evidence of good news. She is happy and that she will get high grades in her studies, God willing. And love, if she sees henna in a dream on her feet, this is evidence that you will soon travel for a walk or to work, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of henna in a married woman’s dream. If a married woman sees that she is putting henna on her hand in a dream, this is evidence of the approaching pregnancy, with permission. God, and if a married woman sees in a dream that she is putting henna on her feet, this is evidence. She will hear good and happy news in the coming days, and if a married woman sees in a dream that her husband Hannah is giving her a gift, this is evidence of profit and goodness for her soon, by God Almighty. And science.Interpretation of henna in a pregnant woman’s dream. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is putting henna on her left hand only, this is evidence of the difficulty of giving birth and that she will give birth.

title: Interpretation of the dream of a notebook in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi in detail

preview.html: A detailed interpretation of the dream of notebooks in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi. This vision is one of the strange visions that can be seen in the dreams of women and men. It is a means of academic success, as well as making accounts for clerks and merchants and seeing them in a dream. There are many interpretations and connotations that are different depending on the condition of the scenes and the details we see in the dream. In this context, we explain to you in detail the interpretation of the dream of a notebook in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi.Interpretation of the dream of a notebook in a dream by Ibn Sirin. This vision, as explained by the scholar Ibn Sirin, is considered one of the praiseworthy visions, which indicates a person’s stability in his life, and also indicates the enjoyment of a peaceful life. And happy and stable, and from this standpoint we explain to you. Interpretation of a dream about a notebook in a dream by Ibn Sirin is also: Seeing a notebook in a dream, as the scholar Ibn Sirin explains, writing down ideas and writing in a notebook. It is proof of the truth in his goodness and that he will collect a lot of money, by God. The highest and most knowledgeable. The vision also relates to the loss of a notebook by someone in a dream. It is a sign that a person does not respect time, and wastes it without the slightest benefit, and God is the Most High, the All-Knowing. Seeing a married woman in a dream is a notebook. This vision indicates that this woman You want to return to childhood and feel nostalgic for old memories. See also: I dreamed that I found gold and took it to the top interpreters for married and single women. Interpretation of seeing a notebook in a dream for a man. Seeing a notebook in a dream for a man includes many interpretations and connotations that could be evidence of the goodness of the monarch. Many interpretation scholars have explained it, and along these lines we explain to you the interpretation of seeing a notebook in a dream for a man: If a person sees in a dream that he is carrying a notebook, but this notebook contains many writings. It is evidence that many good things have arrived to the dreamer. If a man's notebook appears in a dream and it contains only one set of pictures. It is evidence that the fortuneteller is a careless person who is interested in organizing things in life. If one loses the notebook in a dream, this is a sign that he has lost important things and values, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing Jahamah in a dream for single women, married women, pregnant women, and men. Interpretation of seeing a notebook in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a notebook in a dream varies depending on the interpretations that you dream about and the interpretations, based on those details that you see in the dream, as well as based on the social status of the viewer, and on this We explain to you the interpretation of the vision of buying a laptop in a dream for a single woman. It is also: the vision of buying a laptop in a dream for a single girl. It is a sign of good news, and it also indicates the success that the dreamer will achieve in the next life. The vision that he is buying an expensive notebook in a dream This is proof that he will fulfill every desire

title: Interpretation of a dream about white worms coming out of the body

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about white worms emerging from the body. Scientists who interpret dreams have interpreted that seeing many worms emerging from the body indicates that the dreamer is suffering from stress and anxiety. If the dreamer sees many worms in his body, this is a sign of the presence of envious people who hate the dreamer’s life. For an unmarried woman, the presence of many worms in her body, then the vision is a harbinger of her imminent marriage. But if a woman sees in her dream many worms and does not give birth, then this is a sign of the birth of good offspring. If the dreamer suffers from diseases and sees white worms coming out of his body, then for him the vision is news that He has recovered from his illness and is in good health. If the dreamer is in debt and sees white worms in his dream, then this vision indicates that the debt has been spent, and for the meaning, it indicates the death of his concern. Seeing worms coming out of the vagina is evidence of betrayal and also indicates that you are suffering from Poverty. See also: Interpretation of a dream about worms in the hair. Interpretation of dreams about white worms coming out of the body for single women. When an unmarried woman sees white worms coming out of her vagina and feels upset, this is a sign of her good morals and reputation. But if the girl is suffering from a lot of worries and problems and she sees in Her dream is that worms are coming out of her vagina, as this is a sign for her that her problems are over and the beginning of a life free of problems and troubles. Some interpreters believe that seeing worms emerging from the vagina indicates that she is the subject of envy of those close to her. Interpretation of a dream about white worms emerging from the body of a married woman. When a married woman sees in her dream that white worms emerge from her body and does not give birth, this indicates good offspring. If she sees A married woman sees white worms in her bed in a dream. This is evidence of the presence of intimate and envious enemies who do not wish her happiness. However, if a woman sees a black worm coming out of her stomach, this is a sign of her injustice to her family members, and that she is causing them many problems. Seeing worms coming out of a woman’s mouth It means that she is deceiving one of her family members. Seeing worms in a married woman’s home indicates marital problems and disputes that she finds difficult to solve and has to promote herself through legal rukia. Read also: Interpretation of seeing worms in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams of white worms coming out of a pregnant woman’s body. Seeing worms In a pregnant woman’s dream, it indicates an easy birth and that her fetus is in good health. If a pregnant woman sees black worms, this indicates the problems and consequences that she faces on her way, but she will get rid of them soon. While seeing white worms in a pregnant woman’s dream, this is evidence that God is providing for her. With a female. Seeing worms in the bed indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to problems and problems that he faces. Some interpreters believe that seeing white worms indicates happiness and stability. Dream interpretation of white worms coming out of the body of a divorced woman. When a divorced woman sees a white worm coming out of her vagina in a dream, this Indicates the collapse of a

title: Interpretation of a dream about war with the Messenger in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about war with the Messenger in a dream: This vision varies from one case to another, but in all cases we know whether it is good or bad. Interpretation of a dream about war with the Messenger in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about war with the Messenger in a dream: Seeing the Messenger with a lack of soldiers and equipment can mean victory for Muslims, by God. I know the unseen. When seeing the Messenger was accompanied by soldiers laughing, it may mean the defeat of the Muslims, and God knows. Seeing the Prophet can also express goodness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. But if the dreamer sees the Prophet sad because he is moving away from God, then God knows the unseen. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the Prophet Joseph in a dream. Interpretation of dreams can be Seeing the Prophet Joseph in a dream is a sign of freedom from problems and worries, God willing. Likewise, if a married woman sees the Prophet Joseph, this may lead to goodness, and God knows the unseen. If a prisoner sees the Prophet Joseph in a dream, this may be evidence of his release from his prison, God willing. The UnseenThe vision of an unmarried girl of the Prophet Abraham can also be expressed by following the path of guidance, and God knows the unseen. When she sees the divorced wife of the Prophet Abraham, it may be an indication of righteous offspring, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about running in the dark

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about running in the dark in a dream If you want to know the interpretation of a dream about running in the dark in a dream, one of the dreams that many wanted to know is the interpretation of this dream. In interpretations, but by diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream of running in the dark in a dream: Seeing yourself running in the dark in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s desire to isolate himself from others. Seeing himself running in the dark in a dream may mean that he was He feels lonely at that time, and God knows best. If one saw that he was running in the dark, this may indicate rejection of the negative feelings that the person seeing was going through at that time, and God knows best. If one saw that he was running in the dark, this may indicate The benefit that he obtains after the suffering that the dreamer endured in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about running on the road in a dream: Anyone who sees in his dream that he is running very quickly on the road, this may indicate his many skills and abilities to succeed. Running on the road in a dream can That means taking on a great responsibility, thanks to God. If someone saw that he was running in a dream and did not know in which direction, this may indicate that he is afraid of his future and cannot determine his goals. Running on the road in a dream is evidence of the great effort and energy that the owner has. The vision to achieve his dreams. Interpretation of a dream about running in the desert in a dream: Running in the desert in a dream may indicate that there are a large number of happy things in the dreamer’s life at that time. If one saw that he was running in the desert, this may indicate happy times that the dreamer had passed At that time. Seeing running in the desert in a dream may indicate the happiness and joy that the dreamer experiences during this time, thanks to God. Dreaming of running in the desert in a dream may indicate the passage of a difficult period that the dreamer is going through in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation Dreaming of running in an orchard in a dream: Anyone who dreams of running in an orchard can indicate the dreamer's upcoming joys at that time. Running into an unfamiliar orchard in a dream may indicate the confidence that the dreamer feels in those days. If one sees that he is in an orchard with someone This may indicate the affection and compassion that exists between them. A person’s dream that he was running in an orchard in a dream may indicate his good social relationships, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about running barefoot in a dream: A person who sees that he is barefoot may indicate that he is going through a very major crisis in this regard. Time and needs to ask God for help. Seeing yourself running barefoot in a dream may indicate a major financial crisis and the dreamer may be exposed to this period. A person’s dream that he was running barefoot may indicate a deterioration in the psychological life of the dreamer during this period. To see yourself running Barefoot in a dream may indicate some of the sorrows and fears that the owner was facing at that time, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing kidnapping in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about kidnapping in a dream in detail. Seeing kidnapping in a dream means that the dreamer feels anxiety and extreme tension, as it certainly has many indicators that differ from one person to another. For this reason, we will deal in detail with the indicators of seeing kidnapping in a dream, interpretation of seeing an attempted kidnapping, seeing kidnapping in a dream. A married woman, what is the best interpretation of a dream of kidnapping, and this is according to most prominent Arab translators and scholars, as we will discover in this article what is the interpretation of a dream of kidnapping in a dream for everyone who is single, married, pregnant, male and divorced. Interpretation of the vision of kidnapping by Ibn Sirin: The great scholar explained Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of kidnapping in a dream, indicating exploitation by a specific person until he gets what he wants. Also, the interpretation of seeing the kidnapping in a dream symbolizes the dangers that surround my opinion and sadness and anxiety in his life. Seeing a person kidnapped from the family indicates this deception of a person Close to him. My opinion will help me uncover this fraud before it happens. As for seeing someone kidnapping others, this is unknown. This is evidence of the help he provides to friends and family and he loves working with people. Interpretation of seeing a kidnapping, and the dreamer did not see who the kidnapper is, in reference To the fact that he hides secrets from those around him and does not reveal them. Interpretation of a dream about kidnapping my wife in a dream is evidence that the kidnapping process has been completed. This indicates their success in helping someone or indicates deception of a specific person. Seeing kidnapping in a dream symbolizes the defeat of the enemy behind me. Interpretation of seeing kidnapping In a dream, it also explains the dreamer’s failure to achieve what he really wants, and this is due to many difficulties and pitfalls that stand in the path of the pioneer. Interpretation of a dream about the dreamer being kidnapped from in front of his house, this indicates that someone is close to the pioneer, until he is caught and then disappears from His life. The dreamer is cautious and does not reveal his secrets to anyone. The interpretation of dreams of kidnapping and murder also indicates a change in circumstances in the life of the fortuneteller. Interpretation of a dream of kidnapping in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: The interpretation of seeing kidnapping in a dream indicates the dreamer’s failure to achieve what he really wants, and this is due to many difficulties. And the pitfalls that stand in the path of the pioneer. Interpretation of a dream about kidnapping children in a dream, and this indicates the emergence of evil in reality and envy. Interpretation of a dream about kidnapping children indicates that there are many problems in the life of the fortuneteller that he cannot solve. As for the interpretation of a dream about kidnapping children, with the possibility of getting rid of The kidnapper, it indicates a change in circumstances for the better and recovery from illness. The interpretation of being kidnapped from inside the house explains this change in the situation for me because it will only worsen his condition. The interpretation of a dream about being kidnapped also indicates great hardships and hardships. Interpretation of dreams about being kidnapped from the street while he was walking in The street, this indicates a problem that is bothering him, whether through theft, deception, or accidents. The dream interpretation of kidnapping and assault indicates that, in reality, he will reveal the secrets of someone close to him. The interpretation of the dream of kidnapping and escaping from it is evidence of escaping from something and calming my back mind. Interpretation A dream about kidnapping and beating, or an interpretation of a dream about kidnapping and beating

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the Prophet Muhammad in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the Prophet Muhammad in a dream. The connotations of the interpretation of seeing the Messenger in a dream through interpretation books for a single, married, pregnant or divorced woman. Reasons for seeing the Messenger in a dream. Seeing the Messenger in a dream in the form of light through the site about the idea of ​​Imam al-Sadiq, Ibn Shirin, or Ibn Kathir or Al-Nabulsi, seeing the Messenger in a dream other than his image, seeing the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace in a dream, shows the disappearance of tension and anxiety, the enlargement of life, the righteousness of the situation, and the preservation of the soul from Satan. Interpretation of dreams of seeing the Prophet Muhammad in a dream by Ibn Sirino, narrated by Umm al-Fadl. May God be pleased with her, and she said to the Messenger of God: I saw in a dream that he was cut off from your body and placed in my lap, and he said. Well, I saw Fatima giving birth to a son, God willing, and they will put him in your lap, so Fatima Al-Hussein, may God be pleased with them, and put him in her lap. The vision of the Messenger of God In the form of light, it indicates that guidance and justice follow God’s commands. Seeing the Prophet in a dream in the form of light. Seeing the Prophet in a situation that he does not dream of, such as appearing without a beard or cutting off his hands and feet and so on, this indicates a lack of worship and may indicate many sins or fun and leniency. In desires. This vision did not come true for the Messenger in any way, but rather it is merely a warning to the dreamer. Seeing the prophets in a dream is a sign or warning for someone who has a vision. Whoever sees the light and says or hears in the name of the Messenger of God, this indicates that the insight has fled from distress and anxiety, and from evil friends and his righteousness according to God’s command. Seeing the Prophet in a dream in a different form. The Messenger does not identify him as a human being, but some may see him in a dream in the form of a light or An internal feeling that he saw the Messenger in a dream, and this vision is good news for the arrival of happiness, the removal of evil souls, and salvation in this world and the hereafter. Seeing the Messenger in a dream is a formation from heaven, and seeing him in his image are the thoughts of the subconscious mind and the intense desire to see him in reality, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. The Prophet Muhammad in one dream. An unmarried girl can see the image of the Messenger in a dream, and this indicates the many successes she has already achieved on the scientific and practical levels. Imam Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the Messenger Muhammad in a dream is evidence of his closeness to the righteous human being, the righteous Creator. The Prophet Muhammad In a married woman’s dream: A married woman’s vision of the Prophet in a dream may indicate pregnancy soon and may bring a lot of happiness and abundant life. If a married wife sees that the Prophet in a dream is a sign of family stability. Interpretation of the body of the Prophet Muhammad in a dream. The body of the Prophet in a dream indicates blessing, life, and abundance. Health and offspring, and whoever sees himself receiving part of the Messenger’s body, this indicates the distinguished position that the dreamer has. Seeing the Messenger in a pregnant woman’s dream is a good and sustainable thing and she can give birth to good offspring that will bring her happiness and love. Interpretation of seeing the Prophet Muhammad walking in a dream. He may see The dreamer is that the Messenger Muhammad is walking in a certain place, and this is one of the most praiseworthy visions that brings goodness and happiness to the people of that place and

Whoever sees the light and says or hears in the name of the Messenger of God, this indicates that the insight has fled from distress and anxiety, and from evil friends and his righteousness according to God’s command. Seeing the Prophet in a dream in a different form. The Messenger does not identify him as a human being, but some may see him in a dream in the form of a light or An internal feeling that he saw the Messenger in a dream, and this vision is good news for the arrival of happiness, the removal of evil souls, and salvation in this world and the hereafter. Seeing the Messenger in a dream is a formation from heaven, and seeing him in his image are the thoughts of the subconscious mind and the intense desire to see him in reality, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. The Prophet Muhammad in one dream. An unmarried girl can see the image of the Messenger in a dream, and this indicates the many successes she has already achieved on the scientific and practical levels. Imam Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the Messenger Muhammad in a dream is evidence of his closeness to the righteous human being, the righteous Creator. The Prophet Muhammad In a married woman’s dream: A married woman’s vision of the Prophet in a dream may indicate pregnancy soon and may bring a lot of happiness and abundant life. If a married wife sees that the Prophet in a dream is a sign of family stability. Interpretation of the body of the Prophet Muhammad in a dream. The body of the Prophet in a dream indicates blessing, life, and abundance. Health and offspring, and whoever sees himself receiving part of the Messenger’s body, this indicates the distinguished position that the dreamer has. Seeing the Messenger in a pregnant woman’s dream is a good and sustainable thing and she can give birth to good offspring that will bring her happiness and love. Interpretation of seeing the Prophet Muhammad walking in a dream. He may see The dreamer is that the Messenger Muhammad is walking in a certain place, and this is one of the most praiseworthy visions that brings goodness and happiness to the people of that place and
